Activity: Log in, check emails. Gather all feedback received and incorporate it into the final report.
Finalize the report and present it to @itpm-1, @pchmp-1 and other stakeholders. Schedule a meeting with them via email: "Data Quality Assessment Report Presentation".
Prepare presentation materials for the meeting.
Present the data quality assessment report, including the findings, the data quality improvement plan, and the recommendations.
Address any questions or concerns raised by the stakeholders during the presentation. Make any necessary revisions to the data quality improvement plan based on the feedback received.
